review: I have had the fire tv for about a month now and I love it.  It was really easy to set up, sign into my accounts and add apps.  Basically you connect a few cords and sign into your accounts and that is it.  The voice search is amazing so no more typing to find shows or movies. It is so easy to use that my 6 year nephew and 3 year old niece can use it by themselves.  All of the Prime shows are easy to get under Prime Video however there sorted by what Amazon recommends.  I would like to see it sorted by genre of tv show or movie so you can see everything in that category.  But it overall it is better than the Apple Tv and Roku which I also have both of those.
author: Heather Rae
